attributes.action: remove the granting of honours from the patronage of politicians and restore it as the sole prerogative of Her Majesty the Queen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Political patronage in the granting of honours being a patent source of corruption, all grants of honour should be at the sole discretion of the Head of State, Her Majesty the Queen.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
